text: Ana maaŋ muuŋgira thagim, Zisas vhemkora wo khɨkhɨm mbararagim, mba Fhe Bakɨme mba gumgir rɨmrɨɨ vhɨzɨ zav ana nɨɨŋgi ŋkasŋka, ana fhava khavgim, ana kaŋgi, nan ŋkasŋka ŋgari. Ana mbaram dorgav, mba gumgi gu mbigi vhɨrve garav, mbe nzarigi, “The na shaa suirigi?” Mbik Zisas shaa suirav rɨmrɨm vhɨzgi. (5.25)
